Class LegacySegmentPersistenceAdapter

java.lang.Object
ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.LegacySegmentPersistenceAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersistencePort, AutoCloseable
public final class LegacySegmentPersistenceAdapter extends Object implements PersistencePort
Persists reconstructed message pairs using the legacy segment binary format.

Synthesizes TCP metadata to remain compatible with the historical pair viewer. Thread-safe via synchronized methods.

Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

    • persist

      public void persist(MessagePair pair) throws Exception
      Persists the request and response payloads for the provided pair, if present.
      Specified by:
      persist in interface PersistencePort
      Parameters:
      pair - message pair to persist; null is ignored
      Throws:
      Exception - if writing to disk fails
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
      Implementation Note:
      Generates synthetic sequence numbers per flow direction to keep payload ordering.
